title: Dc
body: Seriously, Ive got a good computer and a very good connection but lol kicks me out a lot of times during rankeds or normals just for fun and sometimes i need to uninstall the whole **** programm to come back in the game, that goes fast mostly because my connection is op but wtf why ? i get reports i get sanctions and i loose games and elo just for trying to be a part of lol community, thats not fair dudes....
